nodes.text: Hela Brandes was a Human female from Naboo who served as the Music Advisor in the Naboo Royal Advisory Council under Queen Amidala's rule.

Brandes served as the Music Advisor sitting on the Royal Advisory Council of Naboo around the time of the invasion of the peaceful planet by the Trade Federation. She was a noted harpist who attempted to arrange for Naboo artists and musicians to travel off-planet to demonstrate the talents their society prided. Brandes was also in charge of the funding of Naboo's festivals.

During the Clone Wars, Brandes and a coalition of other illustrious musicians coaxed the renowned symponik master Beezar Pert out of retirement for a one-off special concert to the benefits of the war orphans.
Hela Brandes was portrayed by an uncredited actress in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
The character was referred to as "Helena Brandes" in Star Wars Kids issue 6.
